items.question: What is a 'Neobank'?
options: A bank that only uses physical branches
A bank that only accepts cash
items.explanation: Neobanks operate entirely online through apps and websites.

items.question: Which term describes the process of registering a new customer?
items.explanation: Onboarding is the process of getting a new user started with a service.

items.question: To verify my identity, I ________ (scan) my passport using the app.
items.explanation: 'Scan' is a regular verb; we add -ed for the past simple (doubling the 'n').

items.question: What do you call a bank statement that is sent digitally?
What does KYC stand for in banking?
items.explanation: KYC is a standard process to verify client identity.

items.question: Which term refers to an instant alert received on your smartphone?
items.explanation: Push notifications are instant alerts sent by apps.

items.question: Yesterday, the bank ________ (approve) my loan application.
items.explanation: 'Approve' ends in 'e', so we just add 'd'.

items.question: Which verb is NOT in the past simple?
items.explanation: 'Opening' is a gerund or present participle, not past simple.

items.question: I ________ (download) the mobile app last night.
What is 'Selfie Verification' used for?
options: To apply for a credit card for friends

items.question: He ________ (log in) to his account three times today.
items.explanation: The past simple of 'log in' is 'logged in'.

items.question: If an app is 'mobile-first', it means:
options: It was designed primarily for mobile devices
It is for buying mobile phones
It is very slow on mobile
items.explanation: Mobile-first design prioritizes the mobile experience.

items.question: We ________ (transfer) the money to the savings account this morning.
What digital action involves moving your finger across the screen to browse?
items.explanation: Swiping is the standard gesture for moving through lists or pages on mobile.

items.question: Which of these is a regular verb in the past tense?
The customer ________ (wait) for the verification code.
What do you need for 'Digital ID verification'?
options: A camera and a valid ID
items.explanation: You use the camera to scan your ID document.

items.question: She ________ (check) her balance before buying the phone.
What happens if you go below the 'minimum balance'?
options: The bank closes your account immediately
You might be charged a fee
items.explanation: Many accounts require a minimum balance to stay fee-free.

items.question: The system ________ (update) my personal details.
Which sentence is in the past simple?
They ________ (request) a new debit card last week.
What is the negative form of 'I scanned my ID'?
items.explanation: In negatives, we use 'didn't' + base form of the verb.

items.question: The bank assistant ________ (explain) the fees to me.
Which of these neobanks is well-known? (General knowledge/Context)
items.explanation: Revolut is a famous digital-only bank (neobank).

items.question: I ________ (receive) a push notification about the payment.
What is the question form of 'She transferred the money'?
items.explanation: In questions, we use 'Did' + base form.

items.question: The app ________ (crash) when I tried to log in.
A 'Joint account' is for:
items.explanation: A joint account is shared by multiple people.

items.question: The support agent ________ (help) me with the setup.
How do you pronounce the -ed in 'scanned'?
My father ________ (close) his old bank account.
Which document is usually needed for KYC?
items.explanation: Official ID is required for identity verification.

items.question: We ________ (visit) the branch to sign the documents.
What does 'Real-time' mean in banking?
The company ________ (deposit) my salary yesterday.
Choose the correct spelling:
I ________ (activate) my new card via the app.
Which of these is NOT a digital banking feature?
items.explanation: Mailing paper checks is a traditional banking feature.

items.question: The bank ________ (block) my card for security reasons.
When you use your phone's camera to read a QR code, you are _______ it.
items.explanation: Scanning uses the camera to capture data from a code or document.

items.question: Last month, I ________ (save) 200 euros.
What is a 'Digital Wallet'?
options: A physical wallet with a screen
An app that stores card information for payments
A place to keep paper money
A type of bank account for children
items.explanation: Examples include Apple Pay and Google Pay.

items.question: The transaction ________ (appear) on my statement immediately.
Which word is a synonym for 'Transfer'?
items.explanation: Transferring money means moving it from one place to another.

items.question: She ________ (cancel) her subscription this morning.
items.explanation: The past simple of 'cancel' is 'cancelled' (in British English, 'canceled' in American).

items.question: What is 'Two-Factor Authentication' (2FA)?
options: An extra layer of security (e.g., a code sent to your phone)

items.question: The bank ________ (offer) me a better interest rate.
If you 'log out', you:
items.explanation: Logging out ends your current session.

items.title: Digital Banking Word Search
items.instructions: Find the fintech-related words in the grid.

items.prompt: Match the onboarding action with its purpose.

items.title: Switching to a Neobank
items.text: Last week, Sarah **downloaded** a neobank app. She wanted to open a new account. First, she **scanned** her passport. Then, she **took** a selfie for verification. The bank **approved** her account in ten minutes. She **transferred** 500 euros from her old bank. She **liked** the push notifications for every payment.

vocabularyHelp.definition: Copied a program from the internet to a phone.
Used a camera to read a document.
Moved money from one place to another.

questions.question: What did Sarah do first?
questions.explanation: The text says 'First, she downloaded a neobank app'.

questions.question: How long did the verification take?
questions.explanation: The text says 'The bank approved her account in ten minutes'.

items.title: Support Call: ID Verification
items.transcript:
Agent: Hello, this is Neobank support. How can I help you?
Customer: Hi, I scanned my ID, but the app rejected it.
Agent: I see. Did you use a dark background?
Customer: No, I used a white table. It was very bright.
Agent: That is the problem. Please use a dark background and scan it again.
Customer: Okay, I will try that now. Thank you.

vocabularyHelp.definition: The area behind the main object.

questions.question: What is the customer's problem?
options: The app rejected his ID scan
He wants to close his account
questions.explanation: The customer says 'I scanned my ID, but the app rejected it'.

questions.question: What was the mistake?
questions.explanation: The agent says the white, bright table was the problem.

items.title: Email to Support
items.prompt: Write a short email (30-50 words) to bank support. Say that you scanned your document but you are still waiting for approval. Use the past simple.
items.modelAnswer: Subject: Account Approval. Hello, I downloaded the app yesterday and I scanned my passport. I also took a selfie. However, my account is not active yet. Can you help me? Thank you.
